summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Seattle Public Utilities; authorizing the Director of the Seattle Public Utilities to purchase certain real property located at 10032-10038 Rainier Avenue South, Seattle, Washington, King County Parcel Identification Nos. 807300-0525, -0526, -0531, and -0535, in settlement of a judgment entered into between The City of Seattle and Litchfield Family, LLC, in King County Superior Court Case No. 08-2-08628-3SEA, and to accept and record deeds on behalf of the City; and increasing appropriations to Seattle Public Utilities in the 2010 Budget.
